description: The demolition of existing buildings on the site of Rival Envelope Co Ltd, 50-52 Trundleys Road SE8 and the construction of a part two/part five storey plus basement building, comprising 73 one bedroom, 4 two bedroom, 1 three bedroom and 10 studio penthouse self-contained residential units and office accommodation (Use Class B1), together with associated landscaping, provision of refuse stores and 98 car parking spaces at basement level with ramped vehicular access and associated road works to Trundleys Road.
